member.name: KERB_BINDING_CACHE_ENTRY_DATA
member.summary: Specifies the data for the binding cache entry. You must have the SeTcbPrivilege privilege set.

member.name: KERB_BINDING_CACHE_ENTRY_DATA.DiscoveryTime
member.summary: The time elapsed to find the domain controller to bind to.

member.name: KERB_BINDING_CACHE_ENTRY_DATA.RealmName
member.summary: The name of the realm for which to obtain a binding handle.

member.name: KERB_BINDING_CACHE_ENTRY_DATA.KdcAddress
member.summary: The address of the Key Distribution Center (KDC) of the server to which you want to bind.

summary.para: The type of string that is contained in the KdcAddress member. This can be one of the following values.

listheader.description: The address is a string IP address of the domain controller, for example, "\\157.55.94.74").
The address is a NetBIOS name of the domain controller, for example, "\\phoenix".

member.name: KERB_BINDING_CACHE_ENTRY_DATA.Flags
member.summary: The domain controller flags that the caller provides. These flags are needed to pass to the function.

member.name: KERB_BINDING_CACHE_ENTRY_DATA.DcFlags
member.summary: The domain controller flags. These flags are returned from the function.

summary.para: Flags that provide more information about the binding cache.

listheader.description: No flags are found for the binding cache.

member.name: KERB_BINDING_CACHE_ENTRY_DATA.KdcName
member.summary: that specifies the name of the KDC.
